## IQuadTreeTargetOptions.yieldTime property

When the quad tree is being updated, how long can the UI thread be blocked for? This is tracked per entity, if a single entity takes longer than this it will not be paused until after that entity is finished.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
yieldTime: number;
```
